channel.title: Programming on Henry King's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Henry King's Blog

item.title: Github
item.description: Github基本操作 安装 Github网站： 同时登陆github，添加ssh 增加repositories VPS上： apt install git git config user.name "haelking" git config user.email "xxx.@xxx.com git remote add origin https://github.com/haelking/hkblog.git 如果出现错误：fatal: remote origin already exists，则执行以下语句： git remote rm origin git push origin master 如果出现错误，则 git pull origin master ## push cd /var/www/hkblog git add . git commit -m "all" git push
